attributes.action: We would ask to Petition for the immediate withdrawal for sale of Lyrica Tablets
attributes.additional_details: A ban on the importation and selling of Lyrica Tablets and an Investigation into the License to Dispense of the Producing Company, even the Literature that comes within the Box of Tablets would make for Horrific reading in anyone's estimation .
attributes.background: Withdraw with Immediate effect From the NHS and all Medical Associations Lyrica Tablets , these tablets are causing 100s of needless deaths and over doses per year , especially amongst the younger generations .

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about licensing and approval of medications are a matter for the Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA), which is operationally independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
